item.summary: RegionServer does not go down while aborting

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
HBASE-5641 is available in this. If you see the thread dump "regionserver60020.decayingSampleTick.1" shows as daemon.
So i suspect there is something in the jetty server that is hanging and that being nondaemon makes the RS process to be alive.

@LArs
Was this is the same dump trace you saw in HBASE-5641?
@Ram: is this easily reproducible? And is this full dump? It might be related HBASE-5909.

@LArs
This is not easily reproducible. But let me check HBASE-5909 also.
The attached file has thread dump taken at regular intervals.
It's not immediately clear to me what the issue is. I think this is not urgent enough to hold 0.94.1 for it. Agreed?

we hit this issue today as well

Attached rs_shutdown_hung20130107.jstack was a thread dump during hung ocurred

I've filed HADOOP-9181 to resolve it
Due to "qtp-*" was not a daemon thread, our hbase shutdownhook was not be triggered
we can close this issue now, since HADOOP-9181 had been resolved.
If you have tested this with the fix for HADOOP-9181 then we can resolve this.
Marking as fixed when you run on hadoop 2.0.3-alpha or later.
